form.label: Goals Setup
form.description: Goals are tracked website pageviews that can either have a defined start and finish (i.e. checkout process) or just a finish (order success). Select an existing goal to prefill the form or manually enter new data. The Goal ID should follow the format goal_x. Configured goals will allow you to measure conversion rate and funnel drop of rate on the Goals Overview page. Data from this form will be stored in the lookup file WA_goals.csv

search.query: | inputlookup WA_goals.csv | fields goal_id site description start end
|inputlookup WA_settings.csv | search key=site | fields value source

| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session,Web.uri,host,Web.site | rename Web.uri AS uri | rename Web.site AS site | eval goal_id="$goal_id$" | lookup WA_goals site AS site goal_id AS goal_id OUTPUT start as goal_start end as goal_end | rex field=goal_start mode=sed "s/\*/%/g" | rex field=goal_end mode=sed "s/\*/%/g" | stats dc(Web.http_session) AS Sessions, count(eval(like(uri,goal_start))) AS Entries,count(eval(like(uri,goal_end))) AS Completed | eval "Conversion Rate"=round(100*(Completed/Sessions),2)."%" | eval CompletionRate=round(100*(Completed/Entries),2)."%" | eval NonCompletionRate=round(100*((Entries-Completed)/Entries),2)."%"

|inputlookup WA_goals | search (goal_id!="$goal_id$" OR site!="$site$") | append [search | stats count | eval goal_id="$goal_id$" | eval description="$description$" | eval site="$site$" | eval start="$startswith$" | eval end="$endswith$"] | fields goal_id description site start end | sort goal_id | outputlookup WA_goals createinapp=t | eval Response="Goal was succesfully saved." | head 1 | fields Response
